actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to transfer the functions of the Secretary of Labor under chapters 41, 42, and 43 of such title (relating to job counseling, training, placement and reemployment of veterans) to the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs and for other purposes.

summary.text: Transfers the functions of the Assistant Secretary of Labor relating to job counseling, training, placement, and reemployment of veterans to an Associate Deputy Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to transfer the functions of the Secretary of Labor under chapters 41, 42, and 43 of such title (relating to job counseling, training, placement and reemployment of veterans) to the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs and for other purposes.
